bind-http-https.description: Reserve ports 80 and 443 for the LB. Use this if you intend to use virtual hosts.

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each marathon-lb instance.

haproxy-group.description: HAProxy group parameter. Matches with HAPROXY_GROUP in the app labels.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each marathon-lb task.

role.description: Deploy marathon-lb only on nodes with this role.

ssl-cert.description: TLS Cert and private key for HTTPS.

sysctl-params.default: net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse=1 net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout=30 net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog=10240 net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets=400000 net.ipv4.tcp_max_orphans=60000 net.core.somaxconn=10000
sysctl-params.description: sysctl params to set at startup for HAProxy.

template-url.description: URL to tarball containing a directory templates/ to customize haproxy config.

marathon-lb.name: marathon-lb
